access: A character who is a member of the Knights of Lastwall has access to this option.
markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Lastwall Soup](/Equipment.aspx?ID=516)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Elixir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=59" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 92 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Price** 3 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

**Access** A character who is a member of the Knights of Lastwall has access to this option.

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="" /><row>1 minute (Interact)</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Crimson Reclaimers make this rich, hearty soup using herbs that baffle the senses of the undead. A bowl of Lastwall soup is as nourishing as a full meal. In addition, for 1 hour after consuming a bowl of Lastwall soup, you gain a +2 item bonus to [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) checks and DCs against undead.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Lastwall Soup

Activate 1 minute (Interact) --- Crimson Reclaimers make this rich, hearty soup using herbs that baffle the senses of the undead. A bowl of Lastwall soup is as nourishing as a full meal. In addition, for 1 hour after consuming a bowl of Lastwall soup, you gain a +2 item bonus to Stealth checks and DCs against undead.
